name: 2022 The 4th International Conference on Modern Educational Technology
content: Publication: Submissions to ICMET 2022 will be peer reviewed on the basis of technical quality, relevance to conference topics, originality, significance, clarity, etc. Accepted papers will be published in the International Conference Proceedings Series by ACM (ISBN: 978-1-4503-9679-0), which will be index by Ei Compendex, Scopus, etc.
